name: Pasta with Smoked Salmon and Capers
author: Chardonnay Queen
summary: Serve your salmon-loving friends this elegant and easy pasta dish. For those of you not watching your pennies, substitute caviar for capers. I envy you. We should get together sometime.
ingredients: 6 ounces smoked salmon, cut into strips
directions: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil
Add orecchiette and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, 9 to 12 minutes
Meanwhile, combine cream and onion in a heavy saucepan over medium-high heat
Simmer for 2 minutes and remove from heat
Gently stir salmon, Parmesan cheese, capers, butter, and parsley into the cream mixture and serve over pasta
